known_issues: Sign-in button click results in no action (no visible response when user clicks 'sign in').

existing_features.title: Update the Login page so that clicking “Sign in” always results in visible feedback: either Internet Identity login starts (status changes to “Signing in…”) or an actionable error message is shown when Internet Identity cannot start (e.g., AuthClient not initialized yet or login popup blocked).
Prevent silent no-op clicks by disabling the Login page Sign in button while Internet Identity is initializing, and show clear user-facing text explaining that authentication is still initializing.

projectName: Fix Sign In button doing nothing by surfacing Internet Identity login errors and initialization state
